item.title: Inception - About me
item.description:

ðŸ‘‹ Inception

I’m an AI and machine learning leader with over 20 years of experience building real-world, scalable products at companies like Apple, Meta, and a startup I co-founded. I’ve led cross-functional teams, architected search and personalization systems, and shipped AI-powered experiences used by millions. Now, I’m focused on helping small businesses â€“ especially those outside of the tech industry â€“ understand and apply AI to solve real problems.
